page.title: 18TOURISM GARTH -BEULAH
page.content: Quiet and complete lack of development are chief attractions. Many pleasant walks and central for car trips to sea and beauty spots in a number of areas. Holiday accommodation offered in self catering cottages - 2 in Garth. No Bed and Breakfast catering in block, 5 holiday homes or second homes in Garth and 2 in Beulah. Irfon River Caravan Park near Garth, off B4520 road, in pleasant situation well screened by trees, and not an eyesore. Approx. 30 caravans on site, also space for touring vans and tents. Resident owner on site, also small general shop. Popular during summer. Head for the Hills organises camping holidays on local hills .Based at former recreation hall in Garth, now a private residence.
